mapper.sql: a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_ID, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_3rdprtyPaymentVendor, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_PaymentClearNum, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotEwalletBalance, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotPrepayBalance, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotTopupAmt, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotCashoutAmt, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotCashinAmt, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotPymtCost, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotMarginCashinout, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotIncome1dayAhead, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_Interest1dayAhead, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_TotIncomeToday, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_InterestToday, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_OpCat, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_ProdSeriesID, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_PersonalCat, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_bkp1, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_bkp2, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_bkp3, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_Txt1, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_Txt2, a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_Txt3, a.platform, a.remark, a.creator, a.create_time, a.modifier, a.modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_treasurydb_main a where a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_ID = #{t_TreasuryDB_Main_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_treasurydb_main a where a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_3rdprtyPaymentVendor = #{t_TreasuryDB_Main_3rdprtyPaymentVendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} for update

select
from t_treasurydb_main a where
a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_3rdprtyPaymentVendor like CONCAT('%',#{t_TreasuryDB_Main_3rdprtyPaymentVendor},'%')
and a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_ProdSeriesID like CONCAT('%',#{t_TreasuryDB_Main_ProdSeriesID},'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
and a.t_TreasuryDB_Main_PersonalCat like CONCAT('%',#{t_TreasuryDB_Main_PersonalCat},'%')
and a.t_TreasuryDB_OrgName in (select t_P_VendorEmployeeName from t_personal_info b where b.t_P_VendorEmployeeName = #{t_TreasuryDB_AgencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
order by a.create_time
